chat.settings.code_cacheable.tip: Caching code blocks can reduce the rendering time of long code blocks, but it will increase memory usage
chat.settings.code_cache_max_size.tip: The maximum number of characters allowed to be cached (thousand characters), calculated according to the highlighted code. The length of the highlighted code is much longer than the pure text.
chat.settings.code_cache_threshold.tip: The minimum number of characters allowed to be cached (thousand characters), calculated according to the actual code. Only code blocks exceeding the threshold will be cached.
chat.settings.context_count.tip: The number of previous messages to keep in the context.
chat.settings.max_tokens.confirm_content: Set the maximum number of tokens the model can generate. Need to consider the context limit of the model, otherwise an error will be reported
chat.settings.max_tokens.tip: The maximum number of tokens the model can generate. Need to consider the context limit of the model, otherwise an error will be reported
chat.settings.temperature.tip: Higher values make the model more creative and unpredictable, while lower values make it more deterministic and precise.
chat.settings.thought_auto_collapse.tip: Automatically collapse thought content after thinking ends
chat.settings.top_p.tip: Default value is 1, the smaller the value, the less variety in the answers, the easier to understand, the larger the value, the larger the range of the AI's vocabulary, the more diverse

http.400: Request failed. Please check if the request parameters are correct. If you have changed the model settings, please reset them to the default settings
http.401: Authentication failed. Please check if your API key is correct
http.403: Access denied. Please check if your account is verified, or contact the service provider for more information
http.404: Model not found or request path is incorrect
http.429: Too many requests. Please try again later
http.500: Server error. Please try again later
http.502: Gateway error. Please try again later
http.503: Service unavailable. Please try again later
http.504: Gateway timeout. Please try again later

knowledge.embedding_model_required: Knowledge Base Embedding Model is required
knowledge.chunk_overlap_tooltip: The amount of duplicate content between adjacent chunks, ensuring that the chunks are still contextually related, improving the overall effect of processing long text

knowledge.document_count_help: The more document chunks requested, the more information is included, but the more tokens are consumed

knowledge.threshold_too_large_or_small: Threshold cannot be greater than 1 or less than 0

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.topN_too_large_or_small: The number of results returned cannot be greater than 30 or less than 1.
knowledge.topN_tooltip: The number of matching results returned; the larger the value, the more matching results, but also the more tokens consumed.
knowledge.url_placeholder: Enter URL, multiple URLs separated by Enter
knowledge.dimensions_size_tooltip: The size of the embedding dimension; the larger the value, the larger the embedding dimension, but it also consumes more tokens.

settings.title: Settings

tool.title: Tools Settings
tool.preprocessOrOcr.tooltip: In Settings -> Tools, set a document preprocessing service provider or OCR. Document preprocessing can effectively improve the retrieval performance of complex format documents and scanned documents. OCR can only recognize text within images in documents or scanned PDF text.

websearch.blacklist_description: Results from the following websites will not appear in search results
websearch.blacklist_tooltip:
Please use the following format (separated by newlines)
Pattern matching: *://*.example.com/*
Regular expression: /example\.(net|org)/
websearch.no_provider_selected: Please select a search service provider before checking.
websearch.search_max_result.tooltip: When search result compression is disabled, the number of results may be too large, which may lead to insufficient tokens

tavily.description: Tavily is a search engine tailored for AI agents, delivering real-time, accurate results, intelligent query suggestions, and in-depth research capabilities.
tavily.title: Tavily

websearch.content_limit_tooltip: Limit the content length of the search results; content that exceeds the limit will be truncated.
websearch.title: Web Search
websearch.subscribe_name.placeholder: Alternative name used when the downloaded subscription feed has no name.
websearch.overwrite_tooltip: Force use search service instead of LLM

compression.title: Search Result Compression
compression.cutoff.limit.tooltip: Limit the content length of search results, content exceeding the limit will be truncated (e.g., 2000 characters)
compression.rag.document_count.tooltip: Expected number of documents to extract from each search result, the actual total number of extracted documents is this value multiplied by the number of search results.
compression.rag.embedding_dimensions.tooltip: If left blank, the dimensions parameter will not be passed

error.embedding_model_required: Please select an embedding model first

quickPhrase.title: Quick Phrases
quickPhrase.contentPlaceholder:
Please enter phrase content, support using variables, and press Tab to quickly locate the variable to modify. For example: 
Help me plan a route from ${from} to ${to}, and send it to ${email}.
quickPhrase.deleteConfirm: The phrase cannot be recovered after deletion, continue?

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.enable_privacy_mode: Anonymous reporting of errors and statistics

openai.summary_text_mode.title: Summary Mode
openai.summary_text_mode.tip: A summary of the reasoning performed by the model
openai.service_tier.title: Service Tier
openai.service_tier.tip: Specifies the latency tier to use for processing the request

settings.mineru.api_key: Mineru now offers a daily free quota of 500 pages, and you do not need to enter a key.

confirm.content: Translation will replace the original text, continue?
confirm.title: Translation Confirmation

history.clear_description: Clear history will delete all translation history, continue?
history.title: Translation History

translate.language.same: Source and target languages are the same
translate.language.not_pair: Source language is different from the set language

settings.title: Translation Settings
settings.bidirectional_tip: When enabled, only bidirectional translation between source and target languages is supported

translate.title: Translation

menu.description: Translate the content of the current input box

update.title: Update
update.message: New version {{version}} is ready, do you want to install it now?

translate.smart_translate_tips: Smart Translation: Content will be translated to the target language first; content already in the target language will be translated to the alternative language

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Currently only supported on Windows & macOS

mac_process_trust_hint.title: Accessibility Permission
description: Selection Assistant requires Accessibility Permission to work properly.

Please click "Go to Settings" and click the "Open System Settings" button in the permission request popup that appears later. Then find "Cherry Studio" in the application list that appears later and turn on the permission switch.
After completing the settings, please reopen the selection assistant.

trigger_mode.title: Trigger Mode
trigger_mode.description: The way to trigger the selection assistant and show the toolbar

description_note.windows: Some applications do not support selecting text with the Ctrl key. If you have remapped the Ctrl key using tools like AHK, it may cause some applications to fail to select text.
description_note.mac: If you have remapped the ⌘ key using shortcuts or keyboard mapping tools, it may cause some applications to fail to select text.

trigger_mode.selected_note: Show toolbar immediately when text is selected
trigger_mode.ctrlkey_note: After selection, hold down the Ctrl key to show the toolbar
trigger_mode.shortcut_note: After selection, use shortcut to show the toolbar. Please set the shortcut in the shortcut settings page and enable it.

compact_mode.title: Compact Mode
compact_mode.description: In compact mode, only icons are displayed without text

follow_toolbar.title: Follow Toolbar
follow_toolbar.description: Window position will follow the toolbar. When disabled, it will always be centered.

remember_size.title: Remember Size
remember_size.description: Window will display at the last adjusted size during the application running

auto_close.title: Auto Close
auto_close.description: Automatically close the window when it's not pinned and loses focus

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Set the default opacity of the window, 100% is fully opaque

actions.title: Actions

reset.tooltip: Reset to default actions. Custom actions will not be deleted.
reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset to default actions? Custom actions will not be deleted.

add_tooltip.disabled: Maximum number of custom actions reached ({{max}})

actions.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this custom action?
actions.drag_hint: Drag to reorder. Move above to enable action ({{enabled}}/{{max}})

filter_mode.title: Application Filter
filter_mode.description: Can limit the selection assistant to only work in specific applications (whitelist) or not work (blacklist)

filter_list.title: Filter List
filter_list.description: Advanced feature, recommended for users with experience

icon.label: Icon
icon.error: Invalid icon name, please check your input
icon.tooltip: Lucide icon names are lowercase, e.g. arrow-right

model.label: Model
model.tooltip: Using Assistant: Will use both the assistant's system prompt and model parameters

prompt.label: User Prompt
prompt.tooltip: User prompt serves as a supplement to user input and won't override the assistant's system prompt
prompt.placeholder: Use placeholder {{text}} to represent selected text. When empty, selected text will be appended to this prompt

url.label: Custom Search URL
url.hint: Use {{queryString}} to represent the search term
url.invalid_format: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

user_tips.windows: Please enter the executable file name of the application, one per line, case insensitive, can be fuzzy matched. For example: chrome.exe, weixin.exe, Cherry Studio.exe, etc.
user_tips.mac: Please enter the Bundle ID of the application, one per line, case insensitive, can be fuzzy matched. For example: com.google.Chrome, com.apple.mail, etc.
